text: New York's Broadway from 14th to 26th street was first lighted by electricity and became known as the "Great White Way."

In Idaho, the Experimental Breed Reactor no. 1 aka EBR-1 became the first power plant to produce electricity using atomic energy. It would take 2 more years to prove it could create more fuel than it consumed.
Apple announced it would acquire NeXT Computer and bring co-founder Steve Jobs back to the company he left in 1985.
